name: textprompts
description: TypeScript companion to textprompts for loading and formatting prompt files.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts src/cli.ts --target node --format esm --outdir dist --entry-naming [name].mjs --external fast-glob --external @iarna/toml
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts src/cli.ts --target node --format cjs --outdir dist --entry-naming [name].cjs --external fast-glob --external @iarna/toml
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run format:check && npm run lint:check && bun test
